name: welcome
text: assessWelcome.htm

name: ImpCutAlc
text:
At this time, on a scale of 1-10…

How IMPORTANT is it to you to stop or cut down your ALCOHOL use?
header: These questions ask about your feeling related to your ALCOHOL use. Please answer on the scale numbered 1 to 10 (1 being the lowest and 10 being the highest).

name: ConfCutAlc
text:
At this time, on a scale of 1-10…

How CONFIDENT are you that you can stop or cut down your ALCOHOL use?

name: ReadyCutAlc
type:
10
I am ready to quit now | 9 | 8
I have cut down or am seriously thinking about quitting | 7 | 6
I am thinking about cutting down| 5 | 4
I think I should change my use but I’m not ready | 3 | 2
I think I need to consider changing my use someday | 1 | 0
I am not ready to change my use
text: For this question, please select the number that best fits how you feel currently about your ALCOHOL use, with 10 being "ready to quit now" and 0 being "not ready to change".

name: ImpCutTob
text:
At this time, on a scale of 1-10…

How IMPORTANT is it to you to stop or cut down your TOBACCO use?
header:
These questions ask about your feeling related to your TOBACCO use. Please answer on the scale numbered 1 to 10 (1 being the lowest and 10 .

1 being the lowest and 10 being the highest

name: ConfCutTob
text:
At this time, on a scale of 1-10…

How CONFIDENT are you that you can stop or cut down your TOBACCO use?

How IMPORTANT is it to you to stop or cut down your MARIJUANA use?

At this time, on a scale of 1-10…

How IMPORTANT is it to you to stop or cut down your use of PRESCRIPTION MEDICINES not prescribed to you?
header: These questions ask about your feeling related to your PRESCRIPTION MEDICINES use. Please answer on the scale numbered 1 to 10 (1 being the lowest and 10

name: ImpCutDrug
text:
At this time, on a scale of 1-10…

How IMPORTANT is it to you to stop or cut down your use of all OTHER DRUGS such as narcotics, stimulants, sedative hypnotics, hallucinogens, synthetic marijuana, or inhalants?
header: These questions ask about your feeling related to your OTHER DRUGS use. Please answer on the scale numbered 1 to 10 (1 being the lowest and 10

text:
At this time, on a scale of 1-10…

10

name: DAlcSchool1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you miss school or work to go drinking or because you were hungover?
header: This questions ask about experiences and behaviors related to your ALCOHOL use that may have occurred in the PAST 12 MONTHS.

name: DAlcSchool2
text: Did you miss school or work MORE THAN ONCE because of drinking?

name: DAlcSchool3
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you go to school or work right after you had been drinking, or drink while you were at school or work?

name: DAlcSchool4
text:
You said in the last year you went to school or work right after you had been drinking, or drank while you were at school or work.

Did you do this MORE THAN ONCE?

name: DAlcTrouble1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you get into trouble at school or work or did you have problems with your school/doing your job because of drinking?

name: DAlcTrouble2
text:
You said that in the last year you got into trouble at school or work or had problems with your school/doing your job because of drinking.

Did this happen MORE THAN ONCE?

name: DAlcImportant1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you drink before you did something important or while you were doing something important, like babysitting or working?

name: DAlcImportant2
text: Did you do this MORE THAN ONCE?

name: DAlcArgue1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you get into arguments with your family or friends because of drinking?

name: DAlcArgue2
text: Even though you had problems with your family or friends, did you drink anyway?

name: DAlcFriend1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did any of your friends not want to be with you because you were drinking?

name: DAlcFriend2
text: Even though your friends didn't want to be with you, did you drink anyway?

name: DAlcFight1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you get into any physical fights while drinking?

name: DAlcFight2
text:
You said that in the last year you got into a physical fight while drinking.

Did this happen MORE THAN ONCE?

name: DAlcFight3
text: Even though you got into physical fights, did you drink alcohol anyway?

name: DAlcHurt1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you ever drink in situations where you could get hurt, like right before you were riding a bike, swimming, or driving a car or motorcycle?

name: DAlcHurt2
text:
You said that in the last year you drank in situations where you could get hurt, like right before you were riding a bike, swimming, or driving a car or motorcycle.

Did you do this MORE THAN ONCE?

name: DAlcPolice1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you get in trouble with the police when you were drunk or because you had been drinking?

name: DAlcPolice2
text:
You said that in the last year you got in trouble with the police when you were drunk or because you had been drinking.

Did this happen MORE THAN ONCE?

name: DAlcOften
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you OFTEN drink more than you thought you would?

name: DAlcTime
text: Did you OFTEN wind up drinking for a longer time than you thought you would?

name: DAlcYrQuitTry1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you ever try to quit or cut down your drinking?

name: DAlcYrQuitTry2
text: When you decided to quit or cut down in the last year, were you always able to do so for at LEAST 1 MONTH?

name: DAlcYrQuit
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you OFTEN felt you should quit or cut down?

name: DAlcYrToler1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Could you drink a lot more ALCOHOL than you used to before you got drunk?

name: DAlcYrToler2
text: Did it seem like the same amount had less effect on you?

name: DAlcYrHangov
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Were there many days when you felt sick or hungover after drinking?

name: DAlcYrTime
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you spend a lot of your time drinking?

name: DAlcYrPlan
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you spend a lot of time planning how you would get alcohol?

name: DAlcYrUrge
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you feel such a strong desire or urge to drink that you could not keep from drinking?

name: DAlcThink
text: Did you ever want a drink so badly that you could not think about anything else?

name: DAlcYrActivity
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Were there often things you cut down on or did not do because of drinking, for example, things that you used to like to do?

name: DAlcYrHealth1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did drinking cause you to have any physical health problems or did drinking make a health problem worse?

name: DAlcYrHealth2
text: Did you continue drinking even though it was causing you a physical problem?

name: DAlcYrSad1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did drinking cause you to get sad or depressed or very irritable?

name: DAlcYrSad2
text: Did you continue to drink even though it made you feel sad or depressed or very irritable?

name: DAlcYrSick
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you didn't drink or when you cut down …

Did you feel bad or sick?

name: DAlcYrWorry
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you didn't drink or cut down on drinking…

Did you ever become nervous or worried?
header: This section is going to ask you about things that may have happened in the PAST 12 MONTHS when you didn't drink or cut down on drinking.

name: DAlcYrRestless
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you didn't drink or cut down on drinking…

Did you feel restless, like you couldn't sit still?

name: DAlcYrHeart
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you didn't drink or cut down on drinking…

Did you feel your heart beating fast?

name: DAlcYrVomit
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you didn't drink or cut down on drinking…

Did you feel sick to your stomach or have to vomit or throw up?

name: DAlcYrSleep
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you didn't drink or cut down on drinking…

Did you have trouble sleeping?

name: DAlcYrHead
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you didn't drink or cut down on drinking…

Did you get headaches?

name: DAlcYrSweat
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you didn't drink or cut down on drinking…

Did you sweat a lot?

name: DAlcYrSeizure
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you didn't drink or cut down on drinking…

Did you EVER have any fits or seizures?

name: DAlcYrShake
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you didn't drink or cut down on drinking…

Did your hands shake?

name: DAlcYrHear
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you didn't drink or cut down on drinking…

Did you see, feel, or hear things that other people couldn't?

name: DAlcYrSickUse
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you EVER drink alcohol or take a medicine like tranquilizers or sedatives so that you wouldn’t feel bad or sick from cutting down?

name: DAlcYrCaretaker1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when drinking alcohol caused the most problems…

Did your parent(s) or caretaker(s) seem annoyed or upset with you because you were drinking alcohol?
header: For this section, I would like you to think back to a time in the last year when drinking alcohol caused the most problems.

name: DAlcYrCaretaker2
type: A lot of the time | Some of the time | Hardly ever | Don't know
text: How often did your parent(s) or caretaker(s) seem annoyed or upset with you because of you were drinking alcohol?

name: DAlcYrFamily1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when drinking alcohol caused the most problems…

Did drinking alcohol keep you from doing things or going places with your family?

name: DAlcYrFamily2
type: A lot of the time | Some of the time | Hardly ever | Don't know
text: How often did drinking alcohol keep you from doing things or going places with your family?

name: DAlcYrFriends1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when drinking alcohol caused the most problems…

Did it keep you from doing things or going places with other people your age?

name: DAlcYrFriends2
type: A lot of the time | Some of the time | Hardly ever | Don't know
text: How often did drinking alcohol keep you from doing things or going places with other people your age?

name: DAlcYrSchool1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when drinking alcohol caused the most problems…

Did drinking alcohol make it difficult for you to do your schoolwork or cause problems with your grades/ make it difficult for you to do your work?

name: DAlcYrSchool2
type: Very bad | Bad | Not too bad | Don't know
text: How bad were the problems you had with your schoolwork or work because of this?

name: DAlcYrTeach1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when drinking alcohol caused the most problems…

Did drinking alcohol cause your teacher(s) or boss to be annoyed or upset with you?

name: DAlcYrTeach2
type: A lot of the time | Some of the time | Hardly ever | Don't know
text: How often were your teachers or boss annoyed or upset with you?

name: DAlcYrUpset1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS, when drinking alcohol caused the most problems…

Did drinking alcohol make you feel bad or make you feel upset?

name: DAlcYrUpset2
type: Very bad | Bad | Not too bad | Don't know
text: How bad did drinking alcohol make you feel?

name: DAlHospital
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you been to see someone at a hospital or clinic or at their office because of problems you had from drinking alcohol?

name: DAlApp
text: Do you have an appointment set up to see someone for help with any of these problems?

name: DAlcYrMeeting
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Did you attend a self-help meeting like "AA" or AlaTeen because of drinking?

name: AuOften
type: Never | Monthly or less | 2-4 times a month | 2-3 times a week | 4 or more times a week
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS…

How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
header:
These questions ask about experiences and behaviors related to your ALCOHOL use in THE PAST 12 MONTHS. Please answer all questions, even if they seem similar to ones you have answered before.

Alcoholincludes: beer, malt liquor, wine, wine cooler, or liquor straight or in a mixed drink. 1 Standard Drink = 12 oz bottle or can of beer, a 12 oz bottle or can of wine cooler, a 5 oz glass of wine, or a single shot of liquor straight or in a mixed drink.

name: AuNumDrinks
type: 1 or 2 | 3 or 4 | 5 or 6 | 7 to 9| 10 or more
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS…

How many standard drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typicalday when drinking?

name: AuSixOcc
type: Never | Monthly or less | 2-4 times a month | 2-3 times a week | 4 or more times a week
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS…

How often did you have six or more drinks on one occasion?

name: AuUnableStop
type: Never | Monthly or less | 2-4 times a month | 2-3 times a week | 4 or more times a week
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS, how often have you...

Found that you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?

name: AuFailExpec
type: Never | Monthly or less | 2-4 times a month | 2-3 times a week | 4 or more times a week
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS, how often have you...

Failed to do what was normally expected of you because of drinking?

name: AuNeed
type: Never | Monthly or less | 2-4 times a month | 2-3 times a week | 4 or more times a week
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS, how often have you...

Needed a drink in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?

name: AuGuilt
type: Never | Monthly or less | 2-4 times a month | 2-3 times a week | 4 or more times a week
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS…, how often have you...

Had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?

name: AuRememb
type: Never | Monthly or less | 2-4 times a month | 2-3 times a week | 4 or more times a week
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you been unable to remember what happened the night before because you had been drinking?

name: AuInjury
type: Yes, during the PAST 12 MONTHS | Yes, but not in the  PAST 12 MONTHS | No
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you or someone else been injured as a result of your drinking?

name: AuConcern
type: Yes, during the PAST 12 MONTHS | Yes, but not in the  PAST 12 MONTHS | No
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Has a relative or friend, doctor or other health worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?

name: HonTriedQuit
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you EVER tried to quit, but couldn't?
header:
These questions asks about behaviors related to use of TOBACCO

.

Tobacco includes: cigars, cigarillos, bidis, clove cigarettes, kreteks, blunts, pipe tobacco, and hookah.

name: HonHardQuit
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Do you smoke or use tobacco now because it is really hard to quit?

name: HonAddicted
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you ever felt like you were addicted to tobacco?

name: HonCrave
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Do you ever have strong cravings to smoke or use tobacco?

name: HonNeed
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you ever felt like you really needed to smoke or use tobacco?

name: HonPlace
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Is it hard to keep from smoking or using tobacco in places where you are not supposed to?

name: HonConcentrate
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you haven't smoked or used TOBACCO for a while…OR when you tried to stop smoking or using tobacco…

Did you find it hard to concentrate because you couldn't smoke or use tobacco?

name: HonIrritable
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you haven't smoked or used TOBACCO for a while…OR when you tried to stop smoking or using tobacco…

Did you feel more irritable because you couldn't smoke or use tobacco?

name: HonUrge
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you haven't smoked or used TOBACCO for a while…OR when you tried to stop smoking or using tobacco…

Did you feel a strong need or urge to smoke or use tobacco?

name: HonRestless
text:
During the PAST 12 MONTHS, when you haven't smoked or used TOBACCO for a while…OR when you tried to stop smoking or using tobacco…

Did you feel nervous, restless or anxious because you couldn't smoke or use tobacco?

name: DaMedReason
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you used drugs other thanthose needed for medical reasons?
header:
These questions ask about MARIJUANA or OTHER DRUG use in THE PAST 12 MONTHS. Please answer allquestions, even if they seem similar to ones you have answered before.

Other drugs can include: - Drugs such as heroin, speed, methamphetamine, GHB, mushrooms, Ecstasy, LSD, cocaine, opium, ketamine (Special K), salvia, or Spice/K2 - Inhalants such as sniffing or huffing keyboard cleaners, body spray, glue, permanent markers, propane, gasoline, whippets, nitrous oxide, or paint thinner - �Over-the-counter� medicine such as cough syrup, dextromethorphan (DXM), and cold medicine, Sudafed, or caffeine pills �Other drugs� do not include body-building steroids or medicine prescribed by your doctor that you take according to the instructions

name: DaMultiple
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you used more than one drugat a time?

name: DaStop
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Are you always able to stop using drugs when you want to?

name: DaBlackout
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you had 'blackouts' or 'flashbacks' as a result of drug use?

name: DaGuilty
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you ever felt bad or guilty about your drug use?

name: DaFamily1
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have family or family members ever complained about your involvement with drugs?

name: DaFamily2
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you ever stayed away from your family because of your drug use?

name: DaIllegal
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you engaged in illegal activities in order to get drugs?

name: DaWithdraw
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you ever experienced withdrawal symptoms (felt sick) when you stopped taking drugs?

name: DaStrongMjDaStrongMj
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Was there a time when you felt such a strong desire or urge to use MARIJUANA that you could not keep from using it?

name: DaWantedMjDaWantedMj
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Was there at time that you wanted MARIJUANA so badly that you could not think of anything else?

name: DaStrongDesire
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Was there a time when you felt such a strong desire or urge to use OTHER drugs (not including marijuana) that you could not keep from using them?

name: DaWanted
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Was there a time that you wanted OTHER drugs ( not including marijuana) so badly that you could not think of anything else?

name: DaMedProb
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you had medical problems as a result of your drug use (e.g., memory loss, hepatitis, convulsions, bleeding, etc.)?

name: DaHelp
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you ever gone to anyone for help for a drug problem?

name: DaHospital
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you ever been in the hospital for medical problems related to your drug use?

name: DaTreatment
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you ever been involved in a treatment program specifically related to your drug use?

name: DaOutPatTreat
text:
In the PAST 12 MONTHS…

Have you been treated as an outpatient for problems related to drug use?

name: 90UseHurt
type: Never | Once | Twice | 3-4 times | 5 or more times
text:
During the PAST 3 MONTHS…

When using alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs, how often have you gotten into fights or tried to hurt someone?
header: These questions asks about behaviors related to ANY SUBSTANCE use that you have engaged in during the PAST 3 MONTHS. Please answer all questions, even if they seem similar to ones you answered before.

name: 90PaySteal
type: Never | Once | Twice | 3-4 times | 5 or more times
text:
During the PAST 3 MONTHS, in order to get or pay for alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs, how often have you…

Taken or sold things that weren't yours?

name: 90PayFavor
type: Never | Once | Twice | 3-4 times | 5 or more times
text:
During the PAST 3 MONTHS, in order to get or pay for alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs, how often have you…

Done personal favors for people?

name: 90PaySold
type: Never | Once | Twice | 3-4 times | 5 or more times
text:
During the PAST 3 MONTHS, in order to get or pay for alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs, how often have you…

Sold personal things, like your clothes or jewelry?

name: 90PayIllegal
type: Never | Once | Twice | 3-4 times | 5 or more times
text:
During the PAST 3 MONTHS, in order to get or pay for alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs, how often have you…

Done illegal things other than selling drugs?

name: 90UseAccident
type: Never | Once | Twice | 3-4 times | 5 or more times
text:
During the PAST 3 MONTHS, how many times have you…

Had an accident or been injured due to using alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs?

name: 90UseFight
type: Never | Once | Twice | 3-4 times | 5 or more times
text:
During the PAST 3 MONTHS, how many times have you…

Gotten into fights with a friend due to using alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs?

name: 90UseSchool
type: Never | Once | Twice | 3-4 times | 5 or more times
text:
During the PAST 3 MONTHS, how many times have you…

Had trouble at work/school due to your alcohol, marijuana, or other drug use?

name: 90UseTrouble
type: Never | Once | Twice | 3-4 times | 5 or more times
text:
During the PAST 3 MONTHS, how many times have you…

Had trouble with your teachers or principal due to using alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs?

name: 90UseCrime
type: Never | Once | Twice | 3-4 times | 5 or more times
text:
During the PAST 3 MONTHS, how many times have you…

Committed a crime when using alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs?

name: 90UseAbsence
type: Never | Once | Twice | 3-4 times | 5 or more times
text:
During the PAST 3 MONTHS, how many times have you…

Missed work/school, or gotten to work/school late, due to using alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs?

name: FrAlc
type: None | A few | Some | Most | All
text:
How many of your FRIENDS (the kids you hang around with) do the following:

Drink ALCOHOL?
header: These questions asks about your FRIENDS and their use of substances. Please answer all questions, even if they seem similar to ones you answered before.

name: FrTob
type: None | A few | Some | Most | All
text:
How many of your FRIENDS (the kids you hang around with) do the following:

Smoke cigarettes or use any other type TOBACCO, including smokeless tobacco?

name: FrMJ
type: None | A few | Some | Most | All
text:
How many of your FRIENDS (the kids you hang around with) do the following:

Use MARIJUANA?

name: FrRx
type: None | A few | Some | Most | All
text:
How many of your FRIENDS (the kids you hang around with) do the following:

Use PRESCRIPTION MEDICINES without a doctor's prescription

name: FrMedAmount
type: None | A few | Some | Most | All
text:
How many of your FRIENDS (the kids you hang around with) do the following:

Takes a medicine (PRESCRIPTION or OVER-THE-COUNTER) more often or in larger amounts than you were supposed to?

name: FrDrug
type: None | A few | Some | Most | All
text:
How many of your FRIENDS (the kids you hang around with) do the following:

Uses OTHER DRUGS?

name: RideDrink
type: Not at all | Once | Twice | Three or more times
text:
During the PAST 3 MONTHS, how many times did you…

Ride with a driver who had been DRINKING?
header: These questions ask about riding or driving a car or other motor vehicle in the PAST 3 MONTHS (90 days).

name: RideDrug
type: Not at all | Once | Twice | Three or more times
text:
During the PAST 3 MONTHS, how many times did you…

Ride with a driver who had been using MARIJUANA or any OTHER DRUG?

name: setRideWords
text: setRideWords

name: RideAdult
text: Was the driver who had been %DriverUse  an adult aged 21 or older?

name: RidePeer
text: Was the driver who had been %DriverUse someone your age?

name: RideFamily
text: Was the driver who had been %DriverUse someone who lives with you?

name: DriveAlc
text: On how many of these days did you DRIVE a car after DRINKING?
header: On the calendar, you indicated that in the PAST 90 days you drank alcohol on %AlcDays90 days.

name: DriveDrugs
text: On how many of these days did you DRIVE a car after using MARIJUANA or OTHER DRUGS?
header: On the calendar, you indicated that in the PAST 90 DAYS you have used marijuana or other drugs on %MJDrugDays90 days.

name: PHCigOcc
type: No Risk | Slight Risk | Moderate Risk | Great Risk
text:
How much do you think people risk HARMING THEMSELVES (physically or in other ways) if they do the following?

Smoke cigarettes occasionally ?
header: These questions ask about how risky you thinki it is to engage in certain behaviors involving ALCOHOL, TOBACCO, and OTHER DRUGS.

name: PHCigReg
type: No Risk | Slight Risk | Moderate Risk | Great Risk
text:
How much do you think people risk HARMING THEMSELVES (physically or in other ways) if they do the following?

Smoke cigarattes regularly ?

name: PHAlcOcc
type: No Risk | Slight Risk | Moderate Risk | Great Risk
text:
How much do you think people risk HARMING THEMSELVES (physically or in other ways) if they do the following?

Try 1 or 2 drinks of an alcoholic beverage (beer, wine or liquor)?

name: PHAlcReg
type: No Risk | Slight Risk | Moderate Risk | Great Risk
text:
How much do you think people risk HARMING THEMSELVES (physically or in other ways) if they do the following?

Take 1 or 2 drinks nearly everyday?

name: PHAlcBinge
type: No Risk | Slight Risk | Moderate Risk | Great Risk
text:
How much do you think people risk HARMING THEMSELVES (physically or in other ways) if they do the following?

Have 5 or more drinks once or twice each weekend?

name: PHMJOcc
type: No Risk | Slight Risk | Moderate Risk | Great Risk
text:
How much do you think people risk HARMING THEMSELVES (physically or in other ways) if they do the following?

Smoke marijuana or use hashish occasionally ?

name: PHMJReg
type: No Risk | Slight Risk | Moderate Risk | Great Risk
text:
How much do you think people risk HARMING THEMSELVES (physically or in other ways) if they do the following?

Smoke marijuana or use hashish regularly ?

name: PHSniffReg
type: No Risk | Slight Risk | Moderate Risk | Great Risk
text:
How much do you think people risk HARMING THEMSELVES (physically or in other ways) if they do the following?

Sniff or inhale things to get high regularly ?

name: PHRxReg
type: No Risk | Slight Risk | Moderate Risk | Great Risk
text:
How much do you think people risk HARMING THEMSELVES (physically or in other ways) if they do the following?

Take prescription medications without a doctor's prescription regularly? (e.g., Adderall, Ritalin, OxyContin, Oxycodone, Valium, Percoset, etc.)

name: PHRideOnce
type: No Risk | Slight Risk | Moderate Risk | Great Risk
text:
How much do you think people risk HARMING THEMSELVES (physically or in other ways) if they do the following?

Ride once or twice with a driver who had been using alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs?

name: PHRideSeveral
type: No Risk | Slight Risk | Moderate Risk | Great Risk
text:
How much do you think people risk HARMING THEMSELVES (physically or in other ways) if they do the following?

Ride several times with a driver who had been using alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs?

name: PHDriveOnce
type: No Risk | Slight Risk | Moderate Risk | Great Risk
text:
How much do you think people risk HARMING THEMSELVES (physically or in other ways) if they do the following?

Drive once or twice after using alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs?

name: PHDriveSeveral
type: No Risk | Slight Risk | Moderate Risk | Great Risk
text:
How much do you think people risk HARMING THEMSELVES (physically or in other ways) if they do the following?

Drive several times after using alcohol, marijuana, or other drugs?

name: HaveSib
text: Do you have any brother(s) or sister(s)?
header: These questions ask about your family.

name: SibAlcHigh
type: Strongly Disagree | Disagree | Agree | Strongly Agree
text: I have a brother or sister who gets drunk or high

name: SibMJ
type: Strongly Disagree | Disagree | Agree | Strongly Agree
text:
How much do you agree or disagree with the folowing statements:

I have a brother or sister who smokes cigarettes

name: SibTob
type: Strongly Disagree | Disagree | Agree | Strongly Agree
text:
How much do you agree or disagree with the folowing statements:

I have a brother or sister who uses marijuana

name: SibAlcDrugSch
type: Strongly Disagree | Disagree | Agree | Strongly Agree
text:
How much do you agree or disagree with the folowing statements:

I have a brother or sister who uses alcohol or drugs before school or during school

name: SibDrugTogether
type: Strongly Disagree | Disagree | Agree | Strongly Agree
text:
How much do you agree or disagree with the folowing statements:

I have a brother or sister who uses alcohol or drugs with me?

name: ParentHigh
type: Strongly Disagree | Disagree | Agree | Strongly Agree
text:
How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements:

I have a parent who gets drunk or high
header: Note:When we say "a parent", we mean a mother, a father, a legal guardian, and grandparents who live with you.

name: ParentTob
type: Strongly Disagree | Disagree | Agree | Strongly Agree
text:
How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements:

I have a parent who smokes cigarettes

name: ParentAlc
type: Strongly Disagree | Disagree | Agree | Strongly Agree
text:
How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements:

I have a parent who uses alcohol or drugs soon after getting up in the morning

name: ParentWorry
type: Strongly Disagree | Disagree | Agree | Strongly Agree
text:
How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements:

I have a parent whose use of alcohol or drugs worries me

name: ParentNeedTreat
type: Strongly Disagree | Disagree | Agree | Strongly Agree
text:
How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements:

I have a parent who needs treatment for alcohol or drug problems

name: Forgiveness1
type: Always or almost always | Often | Seldom | Never
text: It is easy for me to admit that I am wrong.
header: The questions in this section are about your spiritual or religious beliefs and practices. Please check ONE BOX for each question.

name: Forgiveness2
type: Always or almost always | Often | Seldom | Never| Not Applicable
text: If I hear a sermon, I usually think about the things I have done wrong.

name: Forgiveness3
type: Always or almost always | Often | Seldom | Never| Not Applicable
text: I believe that God has forgiven me for the things I have done wrong.

name: Forgiveness4
type: Always or almost always | Often | Seldom | Never| Not Applicable
text: I believe that there are times when God has punished me.

name: Forgiveness5
type: Always or almost always | Often | Seldom | Never
text: I believe that when people say they forgive me for something I did, they really mean it.

name: Forgiveness6
type: Always or almost always | Often | Seldom | Never
text: I often feel that no matter what I do now, I will never make up for the mistakes I have made in the past.

name: Forgiveness7
type: Always or almost always | Often | Seldom | Never
text: I am able to make up pretty easily when friends who have hurt me in some way.

name: Forgiveness8
type: Always or almost always | Often | Seldom | Never
text: I have grudges which I have held onto for months or years.

name: Forgiveness9
type: Always or almost always | Often | Seldom | Never
text: I find it hard to forgive myself for some things that I have done.

name: Forgiveness10
type: Always or almost always | Often | Seldom | Never
text: I often feel like I have failed to live the right kind of life.

name: Forgiveness11
type: Always or almost always | Often | Seldom | Never
text: I have forgiven myself for things that I have done wrong.
header: Because of my religious or spiritual beliefs…

name: Forgiveness12
type: Always or almost always | Often | Seldom | Never
text: I have forgiven those who hurt me.
header: Because of my religious or spiritual beliefs…

name: Forgiveness13
type: Always or almost always | Often | Seldom | Never
text: I know that God forgives me.
header: Because of my religious or spiritual beliefs…

name: Forgiveness14
type: Not at all like me | A little like me | Somewhat like me | A lot like me | Exactly like me
text: I would forgive them if they showed they are sorry.
header: If a friend lied to you about something important.

name: Forgiveness15
type: Not at all like me | A little like me | Somewhat like me | A lot like me | Exactly like me
text: It would be easy for me to forgive him/her.
header: If a friend lied to you about something important.

name: Forgiveness16
type: Not at all like me | A little like me | Somewhat like me | A lot like me | Exactly like me
text: It would be hard for me to let go of my anger.
header: If a friend lied to you about something important.
